page.title: 11CLUBS IN MARKFIELD SCOUTS
page.content: Every Friday night is Scouts. You have to be 10yrs. 6mnths.to join. Before that you are in Cubs. Flag Break is at 7.00 p.m. but most people go at 6.15 to play around a bit.We usually have a game and then do something useful. The beginners go and talk to one of the leaders about First Aid or safety in the home. We have to pay 30p.a week 'subs'.This year there is an International Camp at Loughborough where Scouts and Guides from all over the world will come. At this camp we will go out for trips like rollerskating and do activities like karate. The camp is for 8 days and 26 Scouts are going from our troop.
